title: Bug 37021 - Source path wrong in declare warning on binary files
description:
Bug 37021 - Source path wrong in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. See tests/new/binaryWarnings/.. for code to reproduce the problem. 
 Limitations of the tests: These tests generate false positives as filename checking is not enabled in harness verification of messages. (It has been observed in AJDT that if the filename doesn't make sense to AJDT, it simply omits it.)
EB: The source path in the declare warning messages is incorrect when targeting .class files from injars. It is listed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class'
